website_summaries.verdict: A versatile high-temperature steam cleaner with 6 cleaning attachments and a large, 12-ounce water tank.
pros: MLMLANT's pressurized steam cleaner is capable of tackling a diverse array of cleaning tasks from removing wrinkles to breaking down kitchen grime
The rotating nozzle comes in handy for some of those harder to reach jobs, while the safety lock is a thoughtful addition that can help protect from burns
cons: Although the safety cap is designed for protecting agains burns, it can be frustrating to wait 15 minutes to refill while working

customer_reviews.title: Safe and clean
customer_reviews.text: I like this steam cleaner. It’s safe to use. My windows were washed very clean. It’s not as fast as I think, but it’s within acceptable limits.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good product. Helps me out of stains!!! Cleans pretty well. Don't expect it to do all the work for you, it's not a magic wand. Cleans stuck on grease on a stove. Cleans moldy bathrooms. Sanitizes leather couch cushions. Works pretty fast. Doesn't hold a lot of water though, but that's a small issue, for me anyway
customer_reviews.author: Wendy. J

customer_reviews.title: great for deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: So I got this out of frustration after my 4 year old peed all over and into the crevices of the toilet. I steamed the entire toilet to get the pee smells out, and to disinfect the entire thing. It worked naturally which I like, without having to add any more chemicals. However, the only downside is that the water runs out pretty quickly so its frustrating to be elbow deep in a "job" only to have to go refill it. A plus was the several different attachments that were included.
customer_reviews.author: 808bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this Steamer because my son spilled the red crayon shampoo on my car seat. It’s easy to use. Thankfully I got rid of all the colors off my seats. Come with a variety of cleaning attachments, It’s a great cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Shi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to steam clean my couch cushions since we have 3 dogs. I wasn’t sure if it would work but I decided to order it anyways to give it a try. I was not disappointed! It made my couch look and smell like new. I have a sectional couch and it took me about half an hour to clean the whole thing. I would highly recommended this product and would absolutely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great steam Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love steamers for cleaning and sanitizing. This steamer dispenses more water pressure than my older model. I also love the water capacity, you can get more work done before having to fill up again. And it’s not heavy with the bigger reservoir. You still have to put your back into it when cleaning water buildup or grout but it will definitely cut through any old grease or grime.
customer_reviews.author: kim brigham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I cleaned my kitchen in 20 mins. Easy off those oil.
customer_reviews.author: Zhong Zheng

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Especially as the unit won’t let me take top off To refill until ALL steam is out. Used only a few times if I continue using as I have then I wiuls I could say 5 stars from me to you.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this steamer to clean my tub and shower glass and bathroom tile. iT DIDN'T CLEAN ANYTHING. THE STEAMER LASTED LESS THAN 10 MINUTES, AND THEN i COULDN'T GET THE CAP TO SCREW OFF. iT DIDN'T DO ANYTHING IT WAS SUPPOSE TO DO. IT JUST BLEW STEAM AT THE AREAS I WANTED CLEANED AND IT NEVER DID ANYTHING OTHER THAN THAT. sO I'M RETURNING THE ITEM FOR A BETTER PRODUCT. i WAS REALLY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: not practical use
customer_reviews.text: you need to wait to for to start and to use it again
customer_reviews.author: Isty🏋️‍♀️

customer_reviews.title: I would give 3.5 if I could-
customer_reviews.text: This is an Ok product. I purchased it to help with grout cleaning. It did do a decent job, but the unit cannot maintain a high enough pressure for very long. Then one must wait for it to heat again, repeat. Repeat frequently. For the price though I guess it is OK. I used to have a different model that cost 3 times as much, but worked brilliantly. I just wish I could remember that brand because it was worth the price difference. Hence, not quite a 4-star rating since it does pretty well for the price point. I don't think I would buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: idateacher2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I Love My New Steamer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get rid of a bug problem someone brought to home and it has worked wonders. I couldn't afford the initial payment for a professional and the bombs, powders and sprays were busting my checkbook. I love the no chemicals, and it's easy to use once you get your coordination down. I could smell them dying and haven't seen a single one since I used it. It won't sit unused with all of the attachments that came with it, it is now my FAVORITE cleaning tool for my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: it's a decent product for light duty steam cleaning, but there are many far better products out there, but for the price, it's hard not to get one. It works great for steaming surfaces and getting wrinkles out of clothing, but does not perform like a heavy duty steam cleaner. Fair price for a fair product. You really do get what you pay for, but in a pinch, going cheap is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I'm underwhelmed to put it politely. It produced steam just fine but just to test it out, I tried cleaning around my sink, around the bolts that hold the toilet seat onto the toilet & in my shower. Nothing budged! Not even the hard water spots. I feel like I could do better with a regular wet wash rag. I bought it to do some detailing on the inside of my car so I'll update my review after I try it out in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a hot water gun!
customer_reviews.text: It squirts and spurts boiling water, a little steam, under very low pressure and melts surfaces it sets upon. I wouldn’t have paid ten dollars for this, it’s such a piece of junk, I cannot even put it into words! Maybe ouch? Invest in Water-Jel, you’re gonna need it..
customer_reviews.author: I like turtles

customer_reviews.title: Okay job
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this. I used it right away. Like other people said, it needs to be reheated every 5 minutes or so which is frustrating. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean old bugs off the front of vehicles. Worked better than I hoped ! Better than anything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: coedriver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love steamers for sanitizing. This steamer dispenses more water pressure than I expected. Also, you can get more work done because of the water capacity before having to fill up again. Plus, it comes with so many kits with many cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Purui Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is really strong. It's almost like a power wash of steam. I was able to clean off the oil stains on my gas stove in no time. In the box it also has many other adapter heads so you can also clean many other things and iron cloth. Very good product, quality and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and effort
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is great, saves me a lot of time and effort. I just recently heard from my friend that there’s such product like this one. I always struggled when cleaning my stovetop and range hood. Now I have this, low price and done great job. I am so happy to have this item. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SmileyXD

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in and wait 2 mins for water to boil. This machine spray out the air strong and hot. And i use it on my carpet it works very good.Also I have cleaned my car once with this steam cleaner. It is easy to remove grease in the kitchen. The multifunctional accessories allows to use it to clean the floor and windows. This steamer is very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a tool to defrost refrigerator evaporators.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned at least 5 of different versions of these. They're great for cleaning grout too. Pros: Plug n' Play Produces steam fairly quickly Length of time on a full tank is good for the size Child safety button Durable Cleaning pressure Cons: Button can become uncomfortable after long use The attachments aren't that useful for clothes Overall: A good portable product for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Teachmehowtodougefresh

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I blast is adequate enough to power clean around fixtures and grout. I wish the reservoir help more water but it made it thru what l needed it for. I currently am using it in more of an automotive application Cleaning up residue and oil and sanitizing carpets. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: powerful steam really cuts through the grease
customer_reviews.text: My range hood is extremely greasy, I can't even remember when I've cleaned it last time. I tried a couple spray before I got this steam cleaner. This works so much better. The powerful steam really cuts through the grease with little effort. I think I will try this on mold next.
customer_reviews.author: gaga

customer_reviews.title: Steam was lukewarm to touch. Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: The main issue with this is that the steam was no longer hot. It was pathetic I could put my hands in front of the steam, it was lukewarm to the touch, and I didn’t even use any of the extensions that could have tamed the heat. How else can it truly clean anything? In the beginning it was hot but not after a month.
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: This little one is work great . I used this in my kitchen. For the first time use it .it really clean my old kitchen ventilator turn to a new one . This one is easy to clean out and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this steamer mainly for cleaning the carpet pieces in the living room and stairs. But then I realized how much cleaning this thing could do and it’s then turned into a handy cleaning tool. I’m now using more often for cleaning the tile floor. I love this little machine, helps me get rid of messes quickly and my grout has never looked so good.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Leonhardt

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to use. It's very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Works great. When I first saw it I thought it was a little small, but it really goes quite a long time and cleans a lot. Has great power. Easy to use. I really felt I disenfected and left everything clean. I also used it on fabric really worked great
customer_reviews.author: Ivychen

customer_reviews.title: cleans great
customer_reviews.text: bought for Christmas gift and my stepdad loves this thing, says its amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Product performance with satisfactory capacity very limited
customer_reviews.text: Only good for small jobs very short capacity for water it takes as long to heat up then to use the whole
customer_reviews.author: michael fabbioli

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easily
customer_reviews.text: It really exceeded my expectations. It is good mainly for small jobs. I used it to clean the stove exhaust fan and it does a great job every single time. I love that I can switch the heads depending on the task I'm using it for. There is a light that tells me when the steam cleaner is ready to go which I found super useful because I've used other cleaners that just start steaming without any notification.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: It is very good!
customer_reviews.text: The steam engine of this product is very good, and it is very convenient to remove oil stains in the kitchen. It has become very easy to clean the lampblack machine, which is really very convenient. I like this product very much!
customer_reviews.author: Qin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping to use it for my air fryer basket. There suppose to be able to get hot enough. But this one was not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: American Ambition

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only let out steam for about 10 seconds. Tried to unscrew cap and couldn’t get it to come off. Was doing everything correctly, as I made sure to read the instruction booklet before using this. Boxed it back up and returning.
customer_reviews.author: aquadolly130

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought and have rarely used because it’s not very strong of a steam cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Once I finally figured out how to use it, I thought it was great. The instructions are clearly written by someone from another country.
customer_reviews.author: Ice*Nine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, steam can quickly and effectively clean up the oil, the necessary choice at home, the cleaning range hood is very good, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really clean like I thought it would bought it to clean cabinets and stove didn’t work good i would of got same results if I used sponge and hot water
customer_reviews.author: erin mcginn

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is very useful, it really helps to clean some very dirty areas at home. Such as the cooking bench in the kitchen, usually my wife need spend a while to clean the cooking bench, but right now it’s just a piece of cake to do it by this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Yudong Meng

customer_reviews.title: OK but
customer_reviews.text: I gave mine away. I purchased a more expensive steamer that would really deep clean floor grout
customer_reviews.author: Far2silly

customer_reviews.title: Using carefully!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works wonders in the kitchen, on windows, on carpets and furniture. I can't wait to use it to detail my car in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Edababe

customer_reviews.title: Junk, do not purchase this.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it will not stay on and produce steam. The indicator light comes on, the unit gets hot, then shuts off and will not operate. When it's cool, the same sequence occurs again.
customer_reviews.author: PJY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for getting all those places clean, and has so many uses!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennie  l philp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Clean
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot-ish but doesn’t clean. I tried it on my stove top and the grout in my shower. It’s did nothing. I waited too long to try it and can’t return it or I would. It’s going in the donation pile. Complete waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Melody Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to use. no need to connect wire to wall after initial charge. I use it to clean car outside and windows.
customer_reviews.author: Husky S

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works good for small jobs. Wish it had a bigger reservoir for water.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Jones

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I used it to clear the glass in my bathroom. The effects surprised me. It is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fast and clean
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wash my carpet and humidifier. Cleans very nice and fast. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: QQ50454589

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure
customer_reviews.text: Did not have enough pressure for what we wanted to clean and we are too old to bend down holding and using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: i am looking for a cleaner product for my kitchen hood,the hood surface so greasy and the corner can not clean, use it so helpful. And I will try it to clean what the picture show,hope it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Shuwen Li

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this steam cleaner it works wonderfully & will continue to use & recommend to all my friends.

customer_reviews.title: very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my car seats in minutes, over all very efficient with cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: gaoshanliushui

customer_reviews.title: After 2 minutes using it it is necessary to wait until comes the vapor again and doesn't  clean.
customer_reviews.text: They lie when offer "the machine clean everything." I feel so bad because I pay for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Beatriz Beneish

customer_reviews.title: Working go at cleaning Oil
customer_reviews.text: I used it on wall floors and other surfaces, cleans great on most all surfaces, some oil might take a little time to clean it.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not steam my clothes. It sprayed water all over them. This product had poor instructions and was not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The company stands behind its product and will work to make the customer happy.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and the company works diligently to satisfy the customer if any issues with the product arises. Great product and company.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Neat steamer. Difficulty figuring out the on button. Seems I have to hold continuously. Steamer works good. Love the adapters.

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: I was completely surprised at how easy and well this cleaned. So glad I purchased it.

customer_reviews.title: good kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: It is a good kitchen helper. After steaming, to clean the stove is not a hard things anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but holds too little water. Wish the volume was much more.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received 2 of the products, and neither one contained all nine pieces of the accessory set.

customer_reviews.text: i used it to work in my car.it is good for cleaning leather case. I try use it to clean another

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizing for food allergy
customer_reviews.text: Used to steam clean our new home. Works great! I have a food allergy and it cleaned and sanitized our home beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Steam Cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: Tried this steam cleaner on stove/oven - did not cut grease; tried on bathroom grout - did not work Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not work/clean as expected. Expected better results considering all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast, product works as expected.i wii buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ChenilleSkitteralg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money. It’s cheap and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Not happy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOU'RE MONEY ON THIS PIECE OF CRAP !!
customer_reviews.text: DIFFICULT TO USE. BROKE WHEN PLUGGED IN SECOND TIME I TRIED TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Powerful steam
customer_reviews.text: Besides the steamer itself is abit heavy Cleaned this one in about 5 mins. My arm were tired. But everything else is great. Cleaned my sink too. The steam was strong enough to wash off the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: KevinYu

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used it some, mostly trying it out to see if it would work on tough stains in the tub, and it did just what it should. My only complaint is that 350ml of water is not much at all, and you go through it quickly, about 10 minutes. Also, you have to wait for it to cool some before you can fill it, the cap has a safety mechanism built in that will not allow you to open it when hot. My only complaint, and its minor because its kind of common sense, is it gets hot. I could not hold the button down because it was so hot, but putting on a glove took care of that problem.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Quality is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Many of the positive reviews seem a bit deceiving, at least to me. I unboxed the item, put in the recommended water, waited until the light went orange, and went to town on my couch. At first I was impressed with the amount of steam that it produced. Then the amount of pressure decreased significantly after about a minute of use. I had to wait for a "recharge" so that the steam was back at the normal pressure. Water was also dripping out of the handle. I gave this machine another couple opportunities to prove its worth, but haven't had much success. Certainly considering returning this at some point.
customer_reviews.author: M_217

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one use
customer_reviews.text: I hope the manufacture takes back the one I bought and reissues one where the closing top doesn't jam shut. I used it once to steam clean an entire set of abused kitchen cabinets. the scrub attachment and nozzles worked great for areas that had grease and food matter. Stains are a whole different issue . Another time came back to use unit to clean bathroom shower grout etc. and it was working great until it was time to refill the unit.. The twist top would just spin counterclockwise and was totally un-removeable leaving the steamer portion , useless for any further use.
customer_reviews.author: gadgets-today

customer_reviews.title: Good little steamer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mostly to clean windows and shower door tracks. It works very well for that and steam lasts longer than one I had previously. My windows are not wood frame and have these tracks like the shower door. The steamer blasts most of it out, and a Q-tip easily removes any that's left because the steam has softened and loosened it. Very good for areas where you can't get fingers in to clean them. Also like to use it on faucets and toilet seat hinges to sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: GM's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Same as the other reviewer... no continuous stream
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to use this for many cleaning chores, not just clothing. The first thing I tried to steam were my brand new curtains that were all wrinkled but I had to do many passes with a hard to figure out button and then it would stop and you have to wait for it to build up the steam again. I figured it would be easier and faster just to iron them out rather than wait for it to recharge its steam every couple of passes. I also just boxed it up and off it goes to return.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.P

customer_reviews.title: Great little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner did the job for me because I purchased it to clean an arm chair and it was easy to use. The only complaint I have is there should be clearer instructions for using the attachments. Couldn't figure out how to attach them to the steamer. It was easy to fill and I was able to clean the entire chair with only the first fill. My first steam cleaner and I will experiment with other uses i.e. cleaning the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...especially for burned up O ring
customer_reviews.text: I'm so put out.....A little O ring, cheap O ring that this steamer melted....IT"S ON THE PRESSURE KNOB!!!!! and the whole thing is shot. If it's cheap, it will break. Buy the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: will hunting

customer_reviews.title: It’s a BIG NO to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 30 seconds and stop working. Then took 20 mins for it to cool down to remove cap. Tried again and it’s doesn’t work at all now. Warning you have to wait 20 mins every time you want to refill it. The cap will not come off until it’s totally cools off.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, gets the gunk
customer_reviews.text: It's surprisingly powerful. The attachments are useful. I just wish it didnt need to be refilled so quickly, but doing so is no big deal for the power this puts out. The stiff brush attachment can remove just about anything in seconds. The glass attachment is pretty slick, too.
customer_reviews.author: rachbick

customer_reviews.title: MOSTLY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Just used this item to clean my shower and bathroom nooks and crannies. Worked great; however, there is a design flaw where the button on the handle comes off, repeatedly. Not particularly impressed with the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Nelohshopper

customer_reviews.title: MLMLANT handheld pressure steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: MLMLANT handheld pressure steam cleaner it came in on time I am very happy with the product I steam clean more things than I ever thought I would thanks to this machine thanks so much for a wonderful machine
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Steam on demand for whatever you need it for!
customer_reviews.text: Got the smoke damage off of my fireplace from previous owner. I installed a smoke guard after I cleaned the brick to look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very useful. It has enough high temperature and pressure to remove the dirt even grease. Works very good on oven stove and floor, especially the gap. The tools come with make cleaning much easier. I definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for a convenient item
customer_reviews.text: If this your first hand steamer then you will be please to discover its many uses

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new house and was so grateful how this product worked on everything. Perfect size to tag along.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed. It shot steam, then not, back and forth. Must have gotten a bad batch.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my use. Cleaned my tiles and other bathroom items with it .
customer_reviews.author: TheTec

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: Used this item 1x and the top would not come off to refill...just kept spinning counter-clockwise.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Didn't produce hot steam.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to generate cool steam, this is the product for you. I really was expecting a blast of HOT steam so that I could actually clean items. Unfortunately, this was not working. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: gwwraw

customer_reviews.title: the oil will soften itself, and wipe it
customer_reviews.text: The oil I used to clean the cooktop and the cooker hood is very good. No need to scrub, no cleaning agent. Very environmentally friendly. Just spray the water vapor, the oil will soften itself, and wipe it. It would be nice if I bought it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: better of with bucket and brush
customer_reviews.text: The steam cleaner was a lot to do for very little result. The steam spray was weak and really did not clean too well. I was better of with a bucket, 409, and a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Heats up fast.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for defrosting freezer evaporator coils every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money .. terrible.. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

product_meta.title: MLMLANT Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner 450Milliliter Water Tank Capacity 9 Pieces Accessory Set Multipurpose Multisurface all Natural Chemical Steam Cleaning Home Auto Patio More
feature_bullets: ★Fast Heating: 3 to 4 minute heats quickly.Safe Multipurpose Cleaning: use on a wide range of surfacesEasy Handheld Use 9 Pieces Accessory set: Deep clean of your home.

★POWERFUL HOT STEAM: 1050W of Power; Water Tank capacity up to 350ML. Emits pressurized powerful hot steam (250-270F) for up to 20 minutes! Cut through any grease, grout or stain with our high pressure steamer!

★MULTIPLE SURFACE USE: Our handheld steam unit is best suited for sealed surfaces including ceramic, vinyl, laminate, granite, marble, hard wood floors, especially sinks, stoves, counter tops, refrigerators, kitchen, floor, living room, windows, toilet, tiles, shower curtains, bathroom, pet toilet, cat litter boxes, car seats & rims, grill, BBQ, kids toy, mattresses, linen, duvet cover, fabric & Sofa Material, pants, suits, clothing & fabrics!
